Enter which battlefield?None.Endeavoring to Awaken.Endeavoring to Awaken. Behind the Sluices.Stonewalled.The Gates.Saved by the Bell.Quiescence.The Charlatan.Yggdrasil Beckons.Yggdrasil Beckons.Watery Grave.Mistress of Ceremonies.A Barrel of Laughs.Sinister Reign.The Ygnas Directive 6.Skirmishes. ![Fractures/Obscured Domains].Alluvion skirmishes.The Silent Forest.Wind of Eternity.Phantasmic Heroes.1�
Only party members present with you in this area will be transported to  [/this skirmish in ////this alluvion skirmish in /]8����.1�
Proceed?Yes.No.1�
Your request for entry is being considered...�
You have chosen not to enter  [/this skirmish in ////this alluvion skirmish in /]8����.�
You should be able to head  [to the other side/over there] if you have the 3���� and 3����.1�
Head  [for the other side/over there]?Yes.No.Dive right in.1�
The spirits of my ancestors are always watching over me from this place...I think.1�
But it's still really scary to come here by myself, you know?1�
Somehow, I made it here in one piece, so it's time to ring the bell and begin the ceremony!1�
Won't you come pray with me,  ?1�
Daddy, may the lifestream keep you snug in its warm embrace. May you become one with nature, and may she always keep you safe.�
The ceremony has been completed, now that I've buried the stones you gathered for me.1�
, do you remember how Lhaiso rang her bell and called forth the Communion?1�
I think the way my bloodline rings our bells to send off the dead is pretty similar.1�
It's been said that though our spirits rise into the sky when we die, a geomancer's flesh returns to the ground and becomes part of the lifestream.1�
The more we train to use the lifestream, the more we aid nature in all her forms. And now that Daddy is part of the lifestream, he is watching over us all.1�
But this is a belief held only by the descendants of Zacariah, and other geomancers don't lend an ear to our concerns...1� 
Look over there,  . That's the grave of my ancestor, Zacariah.1�
He was one of the five disciples of Sih Renaye--and his grave is the only one left standing.1�
The legends state the other four were chosen by the higher power, and their corporeal forms vanished from Vana'diel.1�
But Zacariah was not, so he was left in this land, cold and alone.1�
Many people say that this is because Zacariah was a traitor.1�
But, I mean, no one knows for sure, right?1�
At least Lhaiso was kind enough to listen to me.1�
Oh--I totally forgot! She gave me a message for you.1�
She wants you to see her at the Order of Renaye in Eastern Adoulin.(Oh, Sylvie, you went and forgot something important again--!)1�
, do you remember what we talked about the last time we were here?1�
You know--what Zacariah's descendants believe about geomancers returning to the earth and becoming part of the lifestream after having understood the intricacies of nature.1�
I think that's the reason why Zacariah, who was branded a traitor, was buried here in the caverns.1�
And likely the reason many of my family chose this as their final resting place as well.1�
...You ready to try this,  ? Let's hope that my ancestors help us to ring the bell.1�
C'mon,  ! Ring the bell!�
<We know that geomancers, who master indicolure magic and purify the lifestream, offer thy shells to the land here.>1�
Th-that's right, great higher power...sir? We've done as our tradition tells us.1�
<Then tell us, blood of Zacariah. Why is the lifestream volatile and disrupted elsewhere, yet not here? Are there those who do not believe Zacariah?>1�
W-well...Zacariah is believed to be a traitor. We do what we can, but...1�
I just know th-that Daddy's death can help bring the other geomancers around! If we can get them to agree, then we can help bring harmony to nature!1�
So please, stop harming the other g-geomancers and save Lhaiso!1�
If it'll help, I'm ready to become p-part of the lifestream right now!1�
<Blood of Zacariah, thou dost deign to understand us, but thou dost not.>1�
<Our anger is not the source of thine anguish. It is all the geomancers themselves.>1�
<Thine awe of nature has turned to a fear of destroying it, and thy ringing bells have actualized it as a Communion.>1�
I-I don't think I understand...1�
<A Communion is a pact with nature. It represents thy will of how things should be, not how they are.>1�
<Dear child, thy bell, too, doth shake in apprehension.>1�
<Yet thy bell rings true. We shall respect thy Communion and make thee part of the lifestream!>1�
The shared memories of generations of mooglekind flood into your mind, granting you the ability to decipher the cryptic glyphs of your 3����...1�

 .Trial 
	.Moogle's Almanack.Return.1�
�This area is currently affected by the Super Kupower: ��Dilatory Digestion��!�
The shared memories of generations of mooglekind flood into your mind, granting you the ability to decipher the cryptic glyphs of your 3����...1�
Who's there?1�
You scared me half to death! Are all adventurers silent like ghosts, or are you the only one with such a predilection?1�
Are you good at sneaking about?<Shuffle, shuffle>.<Clomp, clomp, clomp>.1�
What part of Arciela do you look at?Her glowing face.Her buxom bosom.Her sheathed hips.1�
...What's wrong? Is there something in my teeth?1�
...Can I help you?1�
...My eyes are up here.1�
What do you want with my sword?1�
What do you ask?Is that the founder king's sword?1�
You know of this blade's story? Then you've spent your time in Adoulin doing more than just pioneering.1�
Yes, it was once wielded by the founder king, in a time long past that we now refer to as ��The Epoch.�� He is said to have carried it with him wherever he went.1�
It's called ��Ortharsyne.��1�
You haven't...come here to take it from me, have you?1�
If so, you'll have to pry it from my cold, dead hands.1�
Ha ha! It's a joke,  . I know you're not that kind of person.1�
I can tell just by staring into those clear, dazzling eyes of yours.1�
Hm? You think this sword is the key to meeting the leafkin queen?1�
Are you sure?...6You seem serious about this. It would be an odd thing to lie about, anyway.1�
But you know full well I cannot possibly just hand it over.1�
In other words...I'll join you on your quest.1�

We've met each other in the wilds before,  , so you know I'm not content watching from the sidelines. This leafkin queen--if the rumors about her existence are true, then she must reside in Yorcia Weald.1�
If you look at your map of these caverns, the exit to Yorcia Weald lies at coordinates I-7.1�
Come on,  ! Our adventure starts here!1�
What!?Since when did piles of rubble move!?�
(It sounds like those thieves are about to meet their maker.)1�
(Those lithic figures were once deadly beasts. They were petrified long ago, however, by seven guardians of the forest who had sworn fealty to August and his retinue.)1�
(But now, I fear they...)1�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
